thread.title: MusicNews | Kylie Minogue announces Christmas album with Iggy Pop, James Corden & err.. Frank Sinatra
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Kylie Minogue announces Christmas album with Iggy Pop, James Corden & err.. Frank Sinatra - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | Kylie Minogue announces Christmas album with Iggy Pop, James Corden & err.. Frank Sinatra
text:
Kylie Minogue has just announced the release of a Christmas album next month. Yes, folks, it's that time of year.
It's called 'Kylie Christmas' and is released on November 13th.
The album features contributions from Iggy Pop , but that's not even the strangest name on the tracklisting; it'll also have a posthumous collaboration with none other than Frank Sinatra, thanks to the magic of technology. He'll duet with Minogue on ' Santa Claus is Coming to Town' .
James Corden also features, while Kylie will duet with her sister Dannii on ' 1 00 Degrees ' - but it's only available on the deluxe version of the album (ouch).
You can see the artwork and tracklisting below:
1. It’s The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year
2. Santa Claus is Coming to Town featuring Frank Sinatra
3. Winter Wonderland
4. Christmas Wrapping (With Iggy Pop)
5. Only You (With James Corden)
6. I’m Gonna Be Warm This Winter
7. Every Day’s Like Christmas
8. Let It Snow
9. White December
10. 2000 Miles
11. Santa Baby
12. Christmas Isn’t Christmas ‘Til You Get Here
13. Have Yourself A Merry Little Christmas

MORE: Kylie and Shaggy (yes, that Shaggy) collaborate on new single 'Black & White' - hear it now
